review: It was an amazing experience at Dr. Porwal clinic. Dr. Porwal is truly professional in his approach for treatment. He listened to all my anxious queries before and during treatment with patience and provided appropriate explanation which only increased trust about the treatment. Despite various complications such as tilted wisdom tooth, curved channels for root canal, I am highly satisfied with treatment provided by Doctor. He prescribes very less medication and that too only when it is completely avoidable. I would definitely recommend Dr. Porwal for Dental treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I lost a few of my front teeth.  My uncle took me to Dr.  Bharat Porwal who advised me to get some fixed artificial teeth.  He put me at ease with my apprehension and delivered a fixed bridge which matches my natural teeth.  I'm happy with my smile now

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had some issues with my teeth. Sensitivity was troubling me for a while. I consulted Dr. Porwal who suggested some fillings and a Root Canal treatment. I'm ok now. He has an impressive clinic and modern equipment. Takes a lot of care for infection control.

I had problem with my teeth. I had earlier taken my wife & Mom for the treatment here. So I know the doctor and his treatment experience. I had a good reformation of my teeth (root canal). I like the way he greets the patients & his work is commendable.
reply_text: Thanks for the positive feedback Laxman.

review: The doctor had been really polite and helpful. Made me understand the issue in depth and also about general dental care and precautions. Did gave adequate time and no extra charges for medicine and x ray. Hard to find such doctors in the commercialised medical industry. Strongly recommend the doctor

I had black cavities on my front teeth which were looking very ugly. All these days I was scared of going to the dentist. A friend of mine recommended me to go to Dr Porwal. He advised me to get ceramic laminates. Today my entire look has changed and I can smile without being conscious Thanks to Dr Porwal

Had toothache from past 2 days so thought of showing it to A Doctor. A humble and a patient Dr. , who had a hear to my problem gave me the necessary treatment and some medicines. the pain hasn't completely vanished but its much better then what it was before.

Doctor explained treatment plan in detail to me at my first visit. What i like is he asked me to undergo necessary treatment only where in USA I was told to do total dental rework which i later found out,was not necessary ( treatment i had undergone when i was kid). Thanks Dr. Porwal for making me aware of it.
reply_text: Thanks for the positive feedback Mrinalini
